middleware.ts.purpose: Extending middleware protection to include the bookings route

patterns_discovered.middleware_management: Protected routes follow a consistent path pattern using '/dashboard/' prefix
patterns_discovered.route_organization: Routes are organized by user type (worker, business) and then by feature
patterns_discovered.status_tracking: Auto-claude status file tracks subtask progress with detailed counters

gotchas_discovered.route_consistency: New routes must follow the established path naming convention to work properly with middleware
gotchas_discovered.status_file_impact: Modifying the status file requires updating multiple counters and timestamps simultaneously

approach_outcome.approach: Direct addition of route to existing middleware array
approach_outcome.efficiency: Very efficient - single line change with immediate effect
approach_outcome.validation: No tests mentioned, but simple addition likely low risk

recommendations.middleware: Consider documenting the protected routes pattern for future additions
recommendations.testing: Add middleware tests to verify route protection works correctly
recommendations.maintenance: Consider creating a helper function to manage protected routes dynamically
